screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint titleheight = 54 wsizex, wsizey = 1002, 799 lenlist = 0 if self.timerRunning: titleheight += 30 else: titleheight = 54 self.setTitle("Message") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = (690, 360) wsizex = max(textsize[0] + 171, 1002) wsizey = max(textsize[1] + titleheight + 160, 799) lenlist = len(self.list) * 48 if lenlist > 182: lenlist = 182 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - wsizex) // 2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey) // 2)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(171, 162)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) icon_pos = ePoint(22, 81) icon_size = eSize(80, 80) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(icon_pos) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(icon_size) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(icon_pos) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(icon_size) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(icon_pos) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(icon_size) self["WarningPixmap"].instance.move(icon_pos) self["WarningPixmap"].instance.resize(icon_size) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (684, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(174, 525)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint titleheight = 54 wsizex, wsizey = 1002, 799 lenlist = 0 if self.timerRunning: titleheight += 30 else: titleheight = 54 self.setTitle("Message") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = (690, 360) wsizex = max(textsize[0] + 171, 1002) wsizey = max(textsize[1] + titleheight + 160, 799) lenlist = len(self.list) * 48 if lenlist > 182: lenlist = 182 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - wsizex) // 2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey) // 2)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(171, 162)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) icon_pos = ePoint(22, 81) icon_size = eSize(80, 80) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(icon_pos) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(icon_size) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(icon_pos) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(icon_size) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(icon_pos) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(icon_size) self["WarningPixmap"].instance.move(icon_pos) self["WarningPixmap"].instance.resize(icon_size) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (684, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(174, 525)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))

screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (max(420, textsize[0] + 90), textsize[1] + 75) lenlist = min(len(self.list) * self["list"].itemHeight, 125) listsize = (textsize[0], lenlist) wsize = (textsize[0], textsize[1] + listsize[1] + 15 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO else listsize[1] + 75) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - wsize[0]) // 2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsize[1]) // 2))

screen.name: MessageBoxConfirmCode
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 100 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 70) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)//2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxConfirm
screen.title: Message
